##Opgave 2:
```{r}
library(deSolve)

time <- seq(0, 30, by = 1)
para <- c(r = 0.2, m = 20)
state <- c(R = 100)

Calculate.mRNA <- function(time, R, para){
  with(as.list(c(para)),{
    dR <- -r * R + m
    return(list(c(dR)))
  }
       )
  
}

result <- ode(time = time,
              y = state,
              parms = para,
              func = Calculate.mRNA,
              method = "euler")


para <- c(r = 0.2, m = 22)
result_increasing <- ode(time = time,
                         y = state,
                         parms = para,
                         func = Calculate.mRNA,
                         method = "euler")

para <- c(r = 0.2, m = 18)
result_decreasing <- ode(time = time,
                         y = state,
                         parms = para,
                         func = Calculate.mRNA,
                         method = "euler")
```

```{r}
plot(result,
     main = "Hoeveelheid mRNA transcripts over de tijd",
     ylab = "Hoeveelheid mRNA transcripts",
     xlab = "Tijdpunten",
     ylim = c(85,115))

lines(result_increasing,
      col = "red")

lines(result_decreasing,
      col = "green")

legend("topright",
       c("steady-state", "increasing", "decreasing"))
```
